sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import moment from 'moment'; import useStyles from './styles'; const Postp = (postp) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const classes = useStyles(); return (
{postp.namaPegawai} {moment(postp.createdAt).fromNow()}
{postp.noPegawai.map((noPegawai) => `no telpon : ${noPegawai}`)}
{postp.usia.map((usia) => `Usia : ${usia} tahun`)} ) } export default Postp
